lessons.japanese: ３時にロビーで会いましょう。
lessons.indonesian: I'll meet you in the lobby at three.

lessons.japanese: スリッパでロビーに降りたらだめだよ。
lessons.indonesian: You're not supposed to wear your slippers down to the lobby.

lessons.japanese: ７時までにロビーに来てください。
lessons.indonesian: Please come to the lobby by 7 o'clock.

lessons.japanese: 明日の朝、何時にロビーに集合すればいいですか？
lessons.indonesian: What time should I come to the lobby tomorrow?

lessons.japanese: 友人にロビーで待ってもらってます。
lessons.indonesian: I have a friend waiting for me in the lobby.

lessons.japanese: ロビーで友達を待たせてるんだよ。
